你好！	你好！   MDBG    Nǐ hǎo!     English Hello / how are you
Hello / how are you	Hello / how are you   你好！  MDBG    Nǐ hǎo!
晚上好。	晚上好。   MDBG    wǎnshang hǎo.     English Good evening.
Good evening.	Good evening.   晚上好。  MDBG    wǎnshang hǎo.
喂，你好。	喂，你好。   MDBG    Wèi, nǐ hǎo.     English Hey, hello! (answering the phone)
Hey, hello! (answering the phone)	Hey, hello! (answering the phone)   喂，你好。  MDBG    Wèi, nǐ hǎo.
你说什么？	你说什么？   MDBG    Nǐ shuō shénme?     English What are you saying?
What are you saying?	What are you saying?   你说什么？  MDBG    Nǐ shuō shénme?
他们在说什么？	他们在说什么？   MDBG    Tāmen zài shuō shénme?     English What are they talking about?
What are they talking about?	What are they talking about?   他们在说什么？  MDBG    Tāmen zài shuō shénme?
你做了什么？	你做了什么？   MDBG    nǐ zuò le shénme? (add 了 = something changed or happened)     English What did you do?
What did you do?	What did you do?   你做了什么？  MDBG    nǐ zuò le shénme? (add 了 = something changed or happened)
你做对了。	你做对了。   MDBG    Nǐ zuò duì le. (verb+result grammar: zuo+dui)     English You've done it right.
You've done it right.	You've done it right.   你做对了。  MDBG    Nǐ zuò duì le. (verb+result grammar: zuo+dui)
他们会做。	他们会做。   MDBG    Tāmen huì zuò.     English They know how to do it.
They know how to do it.	They know how to do it.   他们会做。  MDBG    Tāmen huì zuò.
我会做。	我会做。   MDBG    Wǒ huì zuò.     English I know how to do it.
I know how to do it.	I know how to do it.   我会做。  MDBG    Wǒ huì zuò.
你想我了？	你想我了？   MDBG    nǐ xiǎng wǒ le? (Like a statement. Add 吗 = more like a question)     English You missed me?
You missed me?	You missed me?   你想我了？  MDBG    nǐ xiǎng wǒ le? (Like a statement. Add 吗 = more like a question)
